name: MasterWord
description:
How quickly can you complete the grid from the MasterWord?
Using the letters of a random MasterWord you must fill the boxes by thinking of 3,4,5,6,7 & 8 letter words. The timer starts when the new word appears. The game and timer can be paused if you don't have time to complete the grid.
You can send your friends a screenshot of the grid including your time when it's finished.
